key.name: manual-hours
key.description: Time in hours the timer is about to run in manual mode

key.name: manual-minutes
key.description: Time in minutes the timer is about to run in manual mode

key.name: manual-seconds
key.description: Time in seconds the timer is about to run in manual mode

key.name: manual-override
key.summary: Use the values set on the applet
key.description: If set to false, these settings won't change when the "Set Timer" values are changed. Additionally, every time the applet restarts the timer will be set to the "Manual" values

key.name: ui-notification
key.description: Set to true to show notification messages, when timer is finished

key.name: ui-persistent
key.description: Set to true to show persistent notification messages (ModalDialog), when timer is finished

key.name: ui-sound
key.summary: Add a sound effect to the notification
key.description: Set to true to have the notification beep, when timer is finished

key.name: ui-elapsed
key.description: Display elapsed time, instead of a countdown

key.name: ui-time
key.description: Set to true to show time in panel

key.name: ui-chart
key.description: Set to true to show pie chart in panel

key.name: presets
key.description: Key-Value pairs of commonly used timer settings: key is the name of the preset, value the duration in seconds
